topic.title: Plan Of Care Section - conformance rules

ol.li: SHALL contain [1..1] code/@code = "18776-5" Treatment plan (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC STATIC 2.26)

MAY contain [0..1] entry such that it
SHALL contain [1..1] Plan Of Care Activity Act (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.25)

MAY contain [0..1] entry such that it
SHALL contain [1..1] Plan Of Care Activity Encounter (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.25)

MAY contain [0..1] entry such that it
SHALL contain [1..1] Plan Of Care Activity Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.25)

MAY contain [0..1] entry such that it
SHALL contain [1..1] Plan Of Care Activity Procedure (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.25)

MAY contain [0..1] entry such that it
SHALL contain [1..1] Plan Of Care Activity Substance Administration (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.25)

MAY contain [0..1] entry such that it
SHALL contain [1..1] Plan Of Care Activity Supply (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.25)

SHALL contain [1..1] entry such that it
SHALL contain [1..1] Plan Of Care Activity
SHALL satisfy: Contains one or more plan of care activities, represented with Act, Encounter, Observation, Procedure, SubstanceAdministration, or Supply.
